title: Hakoniwa Oukoku no Craft Master
original_name: 箱庭王国の創造主サマ〈クラフトマスター〉
sinopse:
An otaku programmer who spent the last three years creating the world he desired suddenly encounters a BUG; he gets depressed and just goes to bed. When he wakes up, he finds himself in the world he created.

(Source: Champion Scans, edited)
